net.zer0bandwidth.android.lib.database.sqlitehouse.refractor

Class RefractorMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractMap<K,V>
      • java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Class<?>,java.lang.Class<? extends Refractor>>
        • net.zer0bandwidth.android.lib.database.sqlitehouse.refractor.RefractorMap
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.Map<java.lang.Class<?>,java.lang.Class<? extends Refractor>>

    public class RefractorMap
extends java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Class<?>,java.lang.Class<? extends Refractor>>
    Provides a mapping of Java classes to their Refractor implementations. The initializer will define a default mapping, which can be overridden or extended by putting new entries into the map.
    Since:
    zer0bandwidth-net/android 0.1.4 (#26)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getSQLiteColumnTypeFor

        public java.lang.String getSQLiteColumnTypeFor(java.lang.Class<?> cls)
                                        throws IntrospectionException
        Discovers the SQLite column type for a given class, by calling the class's refractor.
        Parameters:
        cls - the class to be refracted
        Returns:
        the SQLite column type given by that class's refractor
        Throws:
        IntrospectionException - if the refractor can't be instantiated
